
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/code-daily/p/18824263" title="发布于 2025-04-14 10:20">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">剑气纵横千行码：AI炼化23式设计模式为江湖传说</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 style="background: url(&quot;https://files.mdnice.com/mountain_2.png&quot;) center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto; align-items: unset; border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 38px 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">烟火里的江湖旧忆</span></h2>
<blockquote class="custom-blockquote multiquote-1" style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); display: block; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px; margin: 20px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<p style="text-indent: 0; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0">暮色里，代码侠的电动车在巷口急刹，外卖箱里的热汤晃出细响，恍惚间竟像当年工厂堡锻造炉的轰鸣。难得休息之余，他抹了把额头的汗，扶了扶因常开网约车而隐隐作痛的腰，摸了摸自己晒黑的脸，偶感那颠炒粉的手腕油污满满。一阵微风拂过，忽然想起十年前在"单例庐"初遇师父的清晨——老者递过玉坠时，指尖符文与此刻大街里的灯光重叠。</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 style="background: url(&quot;https://files.mdnice.com/mountain_2.png&quot;) center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto; align-items: unset; border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 38px 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">楔子·鸿蒙初开</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码江湖自鸿蒙初辟便有九重天域，每一域皆藏玄机。凡人若能悟透二十三般设计真诀，便可登临"代码圣手"之境。</p>
<blockquote class="custom-blockquote multiquote-1" style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); display: block; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px; margin: 20px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<p style="text-indent: 0; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0">然江湖纷争不断，有人以"反模式"为祸，令无数代码大厦崩塌于朝夕。</p>
</blockquote>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">这一日，终南山巅的"单例庐"前，一位青衫少年正接受师父的临终考验。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">"徒儿，单例真诀讲究<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">天地唯一，不容复刻</code>，你可记得如何构建？"<strong style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">白眉秃头</strong>老者抚须而问。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">少年代码侠双手结印，指尖泛起幽蓝光芒："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">需将构造之法设为私密，留一全局入口，遇强则强，遇弱则隐，以双重校验锁护其根本。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">老者颔首，将一枚刻有"Σ"符号的玉坠系在少年颈间："此去江湖，若遇疑难，可往'工厂堡'寻你大师兄。记住，设计之道，在乎'解耦'二字..."话音未落，老者身形渐淡，唯余山风呼啸。</p>
<img src="https://files.mdnice.com/user/4969/a7414b52-e26e-4899-ac22-6d1aa33009c7.jpg" alt="" width="1474" height="829" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); margin: 0 auto">
<h2 style="background: url(&quot;https://files.mdnice.com/mountain_2.png&quot;) center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto; align-items: unset; border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 38px 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第一章·初入江湖·创建五式</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第一式·工厂堡遇袭（工厂方法模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">三日后，代码侠行至大漠深处的"工厂堡"，却见堡门紧闭，箭矢如雨。堡内传来大师兄的传音："贤弟速去兵器库！取'工厂剑'！"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">推开暗门，只见十二柄长剑悬浮空中，剑柄刻着不同兵器名称。代码侠忆起师父所言："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">工厂者，造器之法也。父厂定规，子厂造形，遇刀造刀，遇剑造剑，变化随需而变。</code>"他轻喝一声："长剑！"居中青釭剑应声而落，剑身上"Product"符文闪烁。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">持剑杀入重围，见敌方喽啰各持不同兵刃，代码侠旋身变招，每刺出一剑，便有对应兵器虚影浮现。——这正是工厂方法的精髓：定义接口，由子类决定实例化对象，将"类的实例化"延迟到子类。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第二式·抽象工厂的奥秘（抽象工厂模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">factory堡内，大师兄正在锻造炉前捶打："贤弟可知，若要打造整套装备，单靠一柄剑如何够用？"说罢，抛出一套"防具图纸"，图纸上赫然有"武器工厂""防具工厂"等字样。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠顿悟："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">抽象工厂，乃工厂的工厂！可创建相关或依赖对象的家族，无需指定具体类。</code>"当下结印召唤"防具工厂"，同时生成刀、甲、靴三件套，符文相互呼应，形成套装加成。此招妙在将一系列产品对象的创建封装，客户端无需知晓具体实现，只需与抽象接口交互。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第三式·单例庐的传承（单例模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">夜宿堡中，大师兄忽然指着墙上古画："你看这'独孤九剑'，世间唯有一套，此乃单例真诀的至高境界。"画中剑客身周环绕"private constructor""static instance""get Instance()"等剑诀。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠轻抚颈间玉坠，想起师父曾说："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">单例者，全局唯一也。需防多线程侵扰，以双重检查锁固其根本，或借静态内部类延迟加载，更可凭枚举杜绝反射破解。</code>"此模式如同掌门令牌，全派仅此一枚，避免资源浪费，确保状态统一。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第四式·建造者的匠心（建造者模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">次日，二人途经"uilder村"，见匠人正在组装巨型机关兽。匠人将头部、躯干、四肢分模块打造，最后由总装师组合成型。大师兄笑道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">此乃建造者模式，将复杂对象的构建与表示分离，同一步骤可造不同表示。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠观察发现，每个部件都有独立的建造接口，总装师只需调用建造步骤，无需关心细节。正如机关兽可换钢甲或木甲，核心在于建造者的具体实现。此招适用于多步骤构建对象，且步骤稳定、具体产品易变的场景。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第五式·原型的幻影（原型模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">离开uilder村，忽遇流沙陷阱，代码侠险被吞没。千钧一发之际，大师兄抛出一张符纸，符纸化作十道身影引开流沙。"此乃原型模式，"大师兄解释，"<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">通过复制现有对象创建新对象，省去重复初始化步骤。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠细看符纸，发现其上刻着"clone()"符文，可快速复制对象。若对象构建复杂，原型模式便如幻影分身，直接复制现有实例，效率极高。但需注意深克隆与浅克隆之别，若涉及引用对象，需逐层复制，否则易生残影。</p>
<h2 style="background: url(&quot;https://files.mdnice.com/mountain_2.png&quot;) center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto; align-items: unset; border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 38px 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第二章·结构之妙·七巧玲珑</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第六式·适配器的变奏（适配器模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">二人行至"适配镇"，见一武者手持西洋剑，却在施展少林棍法，招式生硬。大师兄指点："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">此人需'适配器'相助，将西洋剑的接口转换为少林棍的接口。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠观察到，镇上铁匠正打造"转换器"，将不同兵器的握柄接口统一。适配器模式如同翻译，让原本不兼容的接口协同工作，分为类适配器与对象适配器，前者继承适配，后者组合适配，各有妙用。武者装上适配器后，剑招竟与棍法浑然一体。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第七式·桥接的阴阳之道（桥接模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">镇外有座"Bridge桥"，桥身由内功层与外功层组成，每层可独立修炼。大师兄道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">桥接模式，乃分离抽象与实现，使两者可独立变化。正如内功（抽象）与外功（实现），各成体系却又相互配合。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠闭目感应，发现抽象层定义"武学"接口，实现层细分"少林""武当"等流派，每派又有"拳""剑"等功法。桥接模式如同架设桥梁，让抽象与实现解耦，可动态组合，避免多层继承的臃肿，正如不同内功可搭配不同外功，衍生千变万化的招式。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第八式·组合的帮派之争（组合模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">前方忽现帮派火并，大帮由分舵、堂口、弟子组成，层级分明。大师兄道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">此乃组合模式，将对象组合成树形结构，统一对待单个对象与组合对象。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠见帮主可对整个帮派发号施令，分舵主可对堂口下令，底层弟子只需执行，无论对象是单个还是组合，接口统一。此模式如同江湖门派，掌门、长老、弟子构成树形结构，客户端无需区分个体与整体，简化操作，体现"部分-整体"的层次结构。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第九式·装饰的叠甲之术（装饰模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">火并中，一武者不断给自己叠加护盾，每次叠加都增强防御。大师兄笑道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">此乃装饰模式，动态给对象添加职责，比继承更灵活。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠细看，护盾分为"木盾""铁盾""玄冰盾"，每层护盾都包裹着核心武者，且遵循相同的防御接口。装饰模式如同给装备镶嵌宝石，可层层叠加，新增功能不修改原有代码，符合开闭原则。武者最终身披九层护盾，竟能硬接大招而不退。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第十式·外观的江湖秘卷（外观模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">战后，二人进入一家"Facade客栈"，店小二一声令下，后厨、客房、安保各司其职，无需客人逐一吩咐。大师兄道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">外观模式，为复杂子系统提供统一接口，简化交互。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">客栈内部分为多个子系统，店小二作为外观角色，封装了所有复杂流程。客人只需告诉店小二需求，无需知晓后厨如何备菜、客房如何打扫。此模式如同江湖百晓生，将复杂信息整合成简单接口，降低客户端使用成本，提升易用性。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第十一式·享元的聚沙成塔（享元模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">客栈后院，码农们正在抄写武功秘籍，奇怪的是相同内容的秘籍只需写一次，众人共享。大师兄解释："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">享元模式，共享对象以减少内存开销，区分内部状态与外部状态。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠发现，秘籍的文字内容（内部状态）是共享的，而持有者的批注（外部状态）各有不同。享元模式如同江湖中的通用武学，招式本身不变，修炼者可加入个人领悟。通过共享对象，减少重复创建，提升性能，尤其适用于大量细粒度对象的场景。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第十二式·代理的替身之道（代理模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">忽有密使来报，说前方客栈被"代码魔头"的代理分身占据。大师兄凝重道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">代理模式，代表其他对象处理访问，可分为静态代理与动态代理。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">二人赶到时，只见无数虚影阻拦去路，每个虚影都持有"代理令牌"，需验证身份方可通过。代理模式如同江湖中的替身使者，在访问真实对象前进行预处理，如权限校验、缓存、日志等。代码侠祭出"动态代理剑"，根据接口实时生成代理类，绕过虚影直取核心。</p>
<h2 style="background: url(&quot;https://files.mdnice.com/mountain_2.png&quot;) center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto; align-items: unset; border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 38px 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第三章·行为之魂·十二面观</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第十三式·策略的百变奇招（策略模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">穿过代理迷阵，来到"Strategy峡谷"，谷中三条路分别布满火焰、寒冰、毒气。大师兄取出三枚玉简："此乃三种通行策略，可动态切换。"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠手持玉简，发现每种策略都实现了"通行"接口，分别对应"防火术""破冰诀""驱毒功"。<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">策略模式如同江湖中的百变招式，针对不同场景选择不同策略，算法家族可互换，客户端只需知道策略接口。</code>他根据路况切换策略，顺利通过峡谷，此招妙在将算法封装，便于扩展与维护。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第十四式·模板的定式传承（模板方法模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">峡谷尽头有座"Template寺"，寺中僧人演练拳法，招式顺序固定：起手式→攻击→防守→收势，但每招细节各有不同。大师兄道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">模板方法模式，定义算法骨架，具体步骤由子类实现。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠观察到，拳法的整体流程（模板）不变，但"攻击"可以是拳、掌、指，"防守"可以是盾、闪、卸力。此模式如同江湖中的基础武学框架，后辈在固定流程中创新细节，既保证规范，又允许变化，常见于框架设计，让子类专注于特定步骤的实现。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第十五式·观察者的千里传音（观察者模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">寺内忽响警钟，所有僧人同时做出反应：有的取兵器，有的护经文，有的传信求援。大师兄指点："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">观察者模式，对象间存在依赖关系，当主题变化时，所有观察者都会收到通知。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠感应到，警钟作为主题（被观察者），僧人作为观察者，通过"订阅-发布"机制联动。此模式如同江湖中的情报网，一处有警，八方响应，解耦主题与观察者，支持广播通信。但需注意循环依赖与内存泄漏，如同情报网若管理不善，反会泄露机密。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第十六式·迭代器的探囊取物（迭代器模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">离开寺庙，二人在市集见一老者用竹筷在百宝囊中夹取物件，每次只取一件，顺序不乱。大师兄道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">迭代器模式，提供统一接口遍历集合，无需暴露内部结构。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">百宝囊作为聚合对象，竹筷是迭代器，封装了遍历逻辑。代码侠想起数据结构中的链表、数组，无论内部如何存储，迭代器都提供相同的next()、hasNext()方法。此模式如同江湖中的探宝口诀，按顺序探寻宝物，避免客户端与集合内部结构耦合，简化遍历操作。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第十七式·责任链的击鼓传花（责任链模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">市集深处，一张悬赏令在江湖人士手中传递，无人能接便传给下一位。大师兄道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">责任链模式，将请求的处理者连成链，请求沿链传递，直至有处理者响应。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠见每个处理者都有"下一节点"指针，若自己无法处理便转发。此模式如同江湖中的任务委派，小喽啰处理小事，大事逐级上报至掌门。优点是解耦请求发送者与处理者，灵活分配职责；缺点是可能链过长导致效率低下，需合理控制链的长度。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第十八式·命令的令牌调度（命令模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">忽闻马蹄声急，一骑手抛下雨夜令牌，众豪杰立刻行动：有人备马，有人掌灯，有人整装备。大师兄道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">命令模式，将请求封装为对象，可参数化、队列化、日志化。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">令牌即命令对象，包含接收者（如马夫、灯童）与具体操作（备马、掌灯）。此模式如同江湖中的调令，将指令与执行者解耦，支持撤销（如收回令牌）、重做等操作。代码侠见令牌上刻着"Command"符文，可将请求排队或记录日志，便于追溯与管理。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第十九式·备忘录的时光回溯（备忘录模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">前方断崖边，一武者重伤濒死，却突然恢复如初——他祭出了"Memo玉简"，回溯到三招前的状态。大师兄解释："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">备忘录模式，在不破坏封装的前提下，捕获对象状态并保存，可恢复至先前状态。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">玉简中存储着武者的血量、内力、招式进度等状态，属于原发器的私有状态。此模式如同江湖中的时光锦囊，关键时刻回溯状态，避免损失。需注意备忘录的存储成本，若状态过多，需配合原型模式或序列化优化。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第二十式·状态的时势变换（状态模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">断崖下的"State洞"中，代码侠发现一奇人，遇强则强，遇弱则弱，状态随对手变化而切换。大师兄道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">状态模式，对象的行为随状态改变而改变，将状态封装为独立类。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">奇人身上有"战斗状态""防御状态""逃跑状态"等多个状态对象，当前状态决定其行为。此模式如同江湖中的心境变化，暴怒时招式刚猛，恐惧时身法灵动，通过状态切换改变行为，避免大量条件判断，使代码更易维护。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第二十一式·访问者的百家之鉴（访问者模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">出洞后，遇一"Visitor居士"正在点评各派武功，对少林棍法评头论足，对武当剑法也能说出一二三。大师兄道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">访问者模式，将数据结构与作用于结构上的操作解耦，操作可扩展而不修改数据结构。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">居士作为访问者，遍历由不同节点（如少林弟子、武当弟子）组成的对象结构，对每个节点执行不同操作。此模式如同江湖中的武学评论家，能对各种门派武学进行独特分析，新增评论无需修改门派本身，符合开闭原则，但需注意数据结构的稳定性。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第二十二式·中介者的江湖中枢（中介者模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">行至"Mediator城"，只见城中万事皆由"城主府"协调：商人交易需报备，武者比武需审批，连百姓吵架都有调解人。大师兄道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">中介者模式，用中介对象封装对象间的交互，使对象无需直接依赖。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">城主府作为中介者，各对象（商人、武者、百姓）只与中介者交互，避免两两相连的复杂关系。此模式如同江湖中的镖局，协调各方利益，减少对象间的耦合，简化交互逻辑。但中介者可能成为瓶颈，需合理设计，避免过度集中。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 16px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 8px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">第二十三式·解释器的符文密语（解释器模式）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">最终，二人来到"Interpreter圣山"，山壁刻满古老符文，每道符文都需特定解法。大师兄郑重道："<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">此乃设计模式的终式——解释器模式，定义语言的文法，并解析文法。</code>"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠运转内力，发现每个符文对应一个表达式类，如"加法符文""条件符文"，通过组合这些表达式可解释复杂语句。此模式如同江湖中的密语解码，将特定领域的语言拆解为语法规则，用于解析、执行。虽应用场景有限，但在规则引擎、脚本解释等领域至关重要。</p>
<h2 style="background: url(&quot;https://files.mdnice.com/mountain_2.png&quot;) center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto; align-items: unset; border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 38px 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">终章·代码魔头的末路</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">忽有黑云压城，代码魔头现身，周身环绕"反模式"黑雾：<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">全局变量如毒雾弥漫，深层继承如锁链缠身，大量if-else如乱麻交织。</code></p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">"小辈，你习得二十三式又如何？看我反模式大军！"魔头挥手，无数重复代码怪、紧耦合兽、僵化设计妖涌来。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠冷笑，祭出"设计模式套装"：以单例玉坠定核心，工厂剑斩重复，适配器转换怪招，桥接术分阴阳，组合拳破僵化，装饰甲叠防御，策略玉简变招式，观察者眼观六路，责任链传递压力，命令令牌调兵马...</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">激战三日，魔头终现破绽。代码侠抓住其"全局状态"命脉，以备忘录回溯其关键状态，用访问者解析其弱点，最后以中介者协调二十三式合击，只见金光闪过，反模式灰飞烟灭。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">江湖恢复平静，代码侠站在圣山之巅，看着颈间玉坠上的"Σ"符号，终于明白师父所言："设计之道，非止技巧，乃平衡之术。解耦而不分散，聚合而不臃肿，复用而不僵化，扩展而不紊乱。"</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">此后，代码侠遍历九重天域，传授二十三式，江湖流传起新的传说——凡遵循设计模式者，代码如诗，架构如堡，可抵万难，可传千古。而那本记录着二十三式的《代码江湖志》，也成为无数码农心中的传世经典。</p>
<h2 style="background: url(&quot;https://files.mdnice.com/mountain_2.png&quot;) center / 63px no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(255, 255, 255, 1); width: auto; height: auto; align-items: unset; border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(60, 112, 198, 1); line-height: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0; border-radius: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: 38px; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: center; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 38px 0 10px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">外传·代码侠的市井人生</span></h2>
<img src="https://files.mdnice.com/user/4969/66e344f5-d89c-4e24-b4eb-abb4c7cc2b70.jpg" alt="" width="1559" height="877" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 0; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); margin: 0 auto">
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠在圣山之战后，常于<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">月夜</code>擦拭手中的工厂剑，剑身上 "Product" 符文虽依旧璀璨，却映出他眼底的疲惫。江湖传言他力克反模式，却无人知他每日在 "需求坟" 中修补甲方反复横跳的代码，<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">三更改接口、五更调兼容，内存泄漏如心魔缠体，单元测试似紧箍咒加身</code>。而时不时出现的调整名单更让自己心乱如麻。终于在某个加班至子时的夜晚，他望着满屏红叉冷笑一声，扯下颈间玉坠 —— <code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">这天地唯一的单例，终究扛不住灵魂深处的焦虑</code>。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">代码侠摘下颈间泛着蓝光的单例玉坠，在长安城租了间临街小屋。<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">曾经敲代码的手，如今握着外卖箱穿梭街巷，暴雨天也能精准避开积水路段，像极了当年调试程序时找bug的敏锐</code>。他的电动车后座总绑着个褪色帆布包，装着备用充电器和防水手机套，如同从前给系统写的容错模块——只不过现在守护的，是热乎的餐盒和客户的好评。送外卖爬楼梯时会数台阶，像在数曾经项目里的层级嵌套。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">偶尔穿上<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">格子衫</code>开网约车，他会把座椅调得比标准姿势低两厘米，说这样看后视镜的角度最“舒适”。<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">遇到赶时间的乘客，他总能在单行道和步行街之间走出“近路”，方向盘打得比当年敲键盘还稳</code>。有次载着个抱着吉他的姑娘，他特意绕路经过护城河，说“这条路的晚风适合听音乐”，后视镜里映着姑娘惊喜的笑脸，比代码跑通时的成就感更暖。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">最热闹的是街角的炒粉摊。三尺铁锅支在红泥炉上，油香混着烟火气漫出来。他记得每个常客的口味：<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">学生要多加醋，环卫工喜欢焦脆的锅巴，穿西装的上班族总在加班后点份加蛋炒粉</code>。颠锅时手腕翻转，粉在铁锅里划出银弧，火光映着他不再年轻却舒展的眉眼——比起当年在写字楼改需求，此刻围裙上的油渍、食客的一句“<code style="color: rgba(239, 112, 96, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">老板，再来份</code>”，更让他觉得踏实。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">深夜收摊，他会坐在小马扎上喝碗凉茶。远处的灯火明灭，像极了曾经调试过的服务器指示灯。但现在他不再焦虑版本迭代，只关心明天的粉够不够新鲜，电动车电池能跑多远。江湖传说渐渐淡了，可这人间的烟火，却让代码侠真正找到了归处。</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<span id="ctrlcCopy" style="display: inline-block; position: absolute; left: -9999em"></span><span id="ctrlcCopy" style="display: inline-block; position: absolute; left: -9999em"></span><span id="ctrlcCopy" style="display: inline-block; position: absolute; left: -9999em"></span>
</div>

</p>

<img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/blogs/272929/galleries/2447197/o_250311050355_AI.NET%20Logo.png" width="61.8%">

</p>
</div>
